<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pix/statistics/persons/{taxIdNumber}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets statistical data from an end user.

  id={"request"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"taxIdNumber","description":"The account owner tax id. Must be a valid CPF or CNPJ.","schema":{"pattern":"^[0-9]{11,14}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
